text: Tiiu Kull (born August 26, 1958) is an Estonian botanist. She specialises in the study of population dynamics in plant species and has published an extensive number of papers on the subject. In 1997 she conducted a study, "Population studies of native orchids in Estonia". More recently Kull's research has seen her examine the irregularity of temporal patterns in perennial herbs as a phenomenon of intermodular interactions. ==External links== *Homepage *Profile in Estonian Research Information System (ETIS) Category:Estonian botanists Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Estonian University of Life Sciences faculty
title: Tiiu Kull
